description:
Lee is another one of those brainiacs that I have been getting a lot of lately. A graduate student trying to scrape by.
He fudged a little bit when I asked him if he was gay or straight, saying he was bi. Lee is familiar with a lot of the sites that market "Straight" guys, and I think he was worried I wouldn't work with him if he wasn't straight, if not bi.
Once he realized I was eager to work with him no matter, he pretty much gave up on the bi thang, and I'm happy to say he's playing for our team.
Lee is a totally versatile type of guy, eager to show of his dick, as well as his butt. He's watched a lot of gay porn, and really wanted you all to get off to his video. His dick really liked the camera too, cuz the minute his underwear would slide off, BOING! Hard as a rock.
He will definitely be back for more action work. Stay Tuned!
title: Lee - Solo
